scene_description_enriched: A winged figure, likely an angel, dressed in a white robe, holds open a book and points to it with a quill. Facing the angel is a bearded man, seated and wearing a green hat and a red robe with a blue mantle. He is holding a quill and appears to be writing on a scroll. The background is a patterned gold and grey fabric, suggesting an interior setting. The scene likely depicts a moment of divine inspiration or instruction, possibly related to the writing of scripture or prophecy.
